BR_text.BRdescription:
Seems like we introduced quite some verbose warnings with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/pull/308>#308</denchmark-link>
 .
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/brandenchan>@brandenchan</denchmark-link>
  can you please have a look and verify that we only print this warning if we actually removed some baskets without samples? It seems that we now always log this (once per worker).
 Message
 <denchmark-code>04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 Preprocessing Dataset ../data/germeval18/train.tsv:   3%|█████████▏                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 144/5009 [00:00<00:08, 555.22 Dicts/s]04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 04/02/2020 12:34:22 - WARNING - farm.data_handler.processor -   Baskets with the following ids have been removed because they have no Samples: []
 </denchmark-code>
 
 To Reproduce
 run example/doc_classification.py
 System:
 
 OS: Ubuntu 18.04
 GPU/CPU: CPU
 FARM version: current master
